ValidationRule.description: If Product = 401k, Reassign-Category 1 = Website, Reassign-Category 2 = 3(16) Web Access, Reassign-Category 3 needs to be filled in before the case can be saved. Reassign-Category 3 cannot be blank in this case
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Product__c,"401K"), ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_1__c,"Website"), ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_2__c,"3(16) Web Access"), ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_3__c,""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter values for Reassign Category 3
